Posts.Content: Glad to hear you are doing so well! God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: hello! it's been awhile since i've rambled on :)

Posts.Content: Congratulations on 1 yr! Jan. was 1 year since my dx. March 22nd will be 1 year since surgery. I think we should celebrate them all! A year since chemo ended and a year since rads ended. We all deserve to celebrate lol!! Congratulations again. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice

My friend who had the bilateral masectomy 2 weeks ago asked me about taking her BP. She only had nodes rempved on the side with the tumor. Is it ok for her to take her blood pressure on the other arm or not? I know I was told not to use my left arm for BP which was the side I had lumpectomy I was unsure so I came to the experts! God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Checking BP after bilateral masectomy

Posts.Content: Lotion Next word. Fight!
Posts.Title: Rhyming game

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for the need to be here but you will be so glad you found this place. It is full of wonderful women and a few great guys. You will find so much wisdom and support. I think we can all relate to the whirlwind,a lot happens in a short amount of time. Your case is different from mine but I am sure someone with a similar experience will post soon. My kids were grown so they were the first people I told and a few close friends until I had more info. I know someone will have answers for you, never be afraid to ask anything here. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: I am very scared!

Posts.Content: I will be taking my 4th and last Cytoxan and Taxotere treatment this Fri. For me the 2nd and 3rd treatments have been much better than the first. I have not been sick on any of them, did have the sleep problem with the 1st one, but not so much with the others. My chemo brain did not last but a day or 2 after the 2nd&3rd. My taste has not been affected much at all. Just keep drinking lots and lots of water. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: What do I expect after next treatments?

Posts.Content: I understand your pain. I lost my beautiful boxer over a year ago and I cried like a baby for days. So sorry for your pain. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: My Beautiful Angel died

Posts.Content: I recieved the same message, did not reply to her at all. Thank you for posting. God Bless                                                                                    ((((hugs)))) Janice
Posts.Title: SCAMMER ALERT!??

Posts.Content: I understand your pain. I lost my beautiful boxer over a year ago and I cried like a baby for days. So sorry for your pain. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: My Beautiful Angel died

Posts.Content: I think I missed something too. But I have to ask this, how can you tell if a comment is flagged? I don't think I know how to flag one either but I don't really need to, I am just showing how much I know about computers :o) God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Please just LET IT GO..Thanks

Posts.Content: I just talked to Dawne. They did not keep her in the hospital. She was seen at ER with chest pains last night. She just saw her Onc, her heart is fine. She does have a mass the size of a large plum on her aortic arch. This is behind the sternum. If she had not had the chest pains this could have gone unoticed for a while. The trip to the ER was a good thing. She is waiting to hear from surgeon to have biopsy, it should be by Thursday. Dawne was still upbeat and determined to take care of this!! She said to thank everyone for the kindess and prayers. she will be on later but wanted me to update you all. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice She is going out to eat with her family tonight for her birthday!!!!
Posts.Title: Texasgirl 10 update

Posts.Content: Sorry you need to be here but it is a great place for support and info. I also had a lumpectomy clean margins, 3 nodes removed all clear. I also had chemo and rads and am on Tamoxifen now. I am just past the 1 yr. mark from dx and March will be 1 yr. since surgery. My hair was not real long but I did choose to have mine cut short. I did not have enough to donate but I wish I had that is great. Prayers for you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: They say they got it all But..........

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for you and Lesley your girls and all the family. You are in my thoughts and prayers. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Lesley is home

Posts.Content: This is such a great place to get info. I like it because we have ladies (and some guys) who have been through the treatments and surgeries. For the new ones there is always someone with a very similiar story. It is alway nice to get to talk to someone who has been there done that!I have had questions answered that I had not even thought to ask yet! Thank you all. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice

Posts.Content: Looks like you all had a blast! Glad you got to do this. Thanks for sharing pics. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Thanks RE, Cats Toy & Bella Luna for the photos of the CSN REunion!

Posts.Content: I always had a really red face starting on the afternoon of treatment, and the next day. The nurses said it was from the steroids. I only had them the day of tx in the IV. My hands did not really bother me but I did feel warm all over. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice They also bothered my sleep too
Posts.Title: Chemo Glow

Posts.Content: Congratulations!! Such a blessing. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Sharing Good News - New Great Grandson (Non-breast cancer related)

Posts.Content: Boppy is the name my grandson gave me. I was going to be Grammy but he never would say that. he came up with Boppy all on his own (of course I love it) and I have 3 grandchildren so Boppy_of_3, thats me!

Posts.Content: I had the same as you and just finished today!! I had mine after a lumpectomy, my BC was stage 1 grade 1 so caught early. I did really well with the chemo no sickness at all just the tiredness. God bless and prayers being said for you (((Hugs))) Janice

Posts.Content: I like others really don't know what to say except I am sorry. I do know how it feels to have your husband of 27 years just decide he does not want a family anymore and walk away so I know this has to be very painful. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: husband signed up to online dating

Posts.Content: I like others really don't know what to say except I am sorry. I do know how it feels to have your husband of 27 years just decide he does not want a family anymore and walk away so I know this has to be very painful. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: husband signed up to online dating

Posts.Content: Thanks for sharing this beautiful prayer. God Bless you and yours! (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Prayer for tonight (just a suggestion)

Posts.Content: I enjoy reading all of these so much! I have not received mine yet but that just keeps the anticipation growing!! So much fun. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice I love seeing the pics too!!
Posts.Title: Scotch Freckles, thank you, thank you, thank you!!!!

Posts.Content: Congratulations on the good news!! Celebrate!! God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Make room for one more on the dance floor.

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for your loss and all that you are going through. I am glad you have Jesus with you through all this. Where would we be without Jesus Christ holding onto us. I lost my Dad 15 yrs. ago I too was very close to my Daddy. I still miss him but as others have said you will get through this too, one day at a time. I have been through this BC without a husband to rely on too, I am stronger than I gave myself credit for. I will be praying for that same strength for you. I know I could never have done this witout Jesus with me. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice Trust in the Lord with all your heart lean not on your own understanding in all your ways acknowledge him and he will make your paths straight. Pro. 3:5-6
Posts.Title: Lost my Dad June 21st

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear about your sister. My thoughts and prayers are with all of you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear about your sister. My thoughts and prayers are with all of you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: I Lost My Sister Today

Posts.Content: I have been able to drive with all this BC stuff, except the day of lumpectomy. I did have knee surgery a few years ago and could not drive for about 2 weeks I could not stand it. Hope it will not be long till you can drive again. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: driving

Posts.Content: So glad you are getting started on this! I am praying for you. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Wish me luck! Here I go with the new chemo drug!

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for what you are going through. I had to have my boxer put to sleep 18 mos. ago because of cancer. I cried like a baby for days. She got so bad so fast. It was terrible. She was nearly 10 yrs.old so she had been with us for a long time. My son in law buried her for me in the backyard under a pecan tree. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: my dog has cancer

Posts.Content: and I will keep praying for you. Positive thoughts coming your way. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Please just say a little prayer....

Posts.Content: and I will keep praying for you. Positive thoughts coming your way. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Please just say a little prayer....

Posts.Content: Thanks for the info! I appreciate it. I am hoping mine will get better now that I am done with the chemo. Just one of the many things you learn during this journey. Thanks again. God Bless (((Hugs)))Janice
Posts.Title: Dry eyes & tearing - for Janice/Boppy

Posts.Content: The fatigue was one of my worst side effects. I also had trouble sleeping from the steroids which makes the fatigue worse. I did get something to help me sleep too. I had very little nausea but it was hard to find something that tasted good. When I was hungry it was usually for junk food :o( God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: 1st Chemo 2 days ago!

Posts.Content: I have on a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle t-shirt!! My son loved the TMNT when he was little so I had to buy this shirt when I saw it lol God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: green: Who is wearing GREEN today?

Posts.Content: I was able to go visit Dawne for a while this afternoon. I was so glad to be able to spend time with her. She wanted me to post and tell you all she sends her love and that she is praying for all of you. Dawne has had some relief from the lymphedema. They placed a stent in her arm and it has drained some and looks so much better. Dawne is still in a lot of pain, she has fluid in her chest area again, they could not drain it right away because she is to weak. She goes to the Dr on Monday. She is still fighting and her spirit is amazing. Her daughter is staying with them all the time and doing a wonderful job caring for her Mom. Dawnes Mom comes everyday and is there for Dawne anytime she needs her. Dawnes husband is her rock, he is incredibly supportive. Her family is a strong support system for Dawne. Thank you all for the prayers and please continue to keep Dawne in your thoughts and prayers. God Bless you all                                                     (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Grettings from Dawne

Posts.Content: Mine is a praise and worship song called Light at the end of the Tunnel by Third Day I think. I am terrible at remembering who sings what songs. God Bless (((HUgs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Whats your ringtone?

Posts.Content: I am so happy for you!! It is great to finish rads. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: I am a rad grad! Yipee!!

Posts.Content: Glad to hear from you, praying for you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Meena .. How are you doing, our PINK WARRIOR .. We are thinking about you

Posts.Content: I found it about 6 wks after I was diagnosed. I was a lurker at first, joined in April of this yr. This site has been a great comfort someone always has a answer to your question no matter how crazy it may seem to you.Someone is there to comfort you and make you feel better. It has been a great asset to me. Thanks to all you wonderful people! God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: How long have you been on this board?

Posts.Content: I had the same chemo as you and had 4 rounds. I too had good veins and did not get a port. I did fine through all my treatment. I used the one arm too that was not affected by node removal. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Four rounds of chemo, will I need a VAP?

Posts.Content: So glad it was better than expected. I felt that way too I think we make it so much worse in our mind that is is easier than we imagined! God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: 1st chemo...the worst bit was walking thru the door!

Posts.Content: Thank you for sharing such a beautiful story. The miracle of new life!! God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: The Miracle of Life.... I just had to share...

Posts.Content: So happy you are a rad grad!! God bless (((Hugs)))Janice
Posts.Title: Teacher says, "Every time a bell rings...

Posts.Content: So happy for you!! It does feel so good to be done with chemo.God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Finished Chemo!

Posts.Content: Glad to see this here and I know everyone else will be! You are very welcome as you know my dear friend. Love ya! God Bless                                                   (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Hi, it's me Texasgirl10

Posts.Content: I am asking for prayers for Dawne sweet sisters. She has been at the hospital since about 11:30 our time. She has a deep blood clot in her jugular vein. It is a very dangerous situation. She is scared and worried. She is still in the ER Dept but as soon as they get her to a room I am going to go to the hospital. Please cover her and Donald in prayer. I promise to update as soon as I can. God Bless                                                        (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Prayers needed now for Dawne please

Posts.Content: Congratulations!! I am so happy for you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: And the News Just Gets Better

Posts.Content: So sorry for your loss Nancy. Prayers for the family and for you. God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: With a heavy heart..

Posts.Content: So glad the results were better that you had thought they might be!! God Bless (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Get pet scans RESULTS in the am.... left out an important word!!!

Posts.Content: Congratulations!! a new little one to love! Grandchildren are the best. Safe travels. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Non bc celebration :-)

Posts.Content: I had a dexascan done. I ask my Onc. about it because osteoporosis (sp?) is so bad on my Mom's side of the family. My Mom has it, sister in early stages. My scan came back good. One of the easiest scans I have had really fast and easy...... and you do not have to undress from the waist up and put a gown on. I have heard that to many times this past year! lol God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Muscle Girls... was a Bone Density Test recommended for You?

Posts.Content: Thanks for the smiles!! God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Through A Child's Eyes...

Posts.Content: So sorry Heather that you are not feeling well. I hope it is nothing that will keep you from getting your treatment. Prayers for you and your Mom both. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: ughh Chemo #5 and I'm sick!

Posts.Content: Thank you all for being so considerate and kind to ask, thank you Doris for bumping. I had not seen this. I am doing well, I  see my Onc at the end of July. I had my mammo a couple of months ago and all was good there!! I still have chemo brain at times, at least I am blaming chemo still :o). It will be 3 years Tues since my last treatment. I don't want to admit to just being forgetful at times due to age so I am using chemo brain as my excuse!! I just have the aches and hot flashes etc that go along with aromasin, most of the time the SE's are not to bad. We are baking here in the central Texas area right now, as are a lot of other areas in the country. I have had trouble with my knee, after a 2nd injection of a different kind it is doing better. I still have so pain but not near as much as before so that is good. I stay busy everyday keeping up with my 5 wonderful grandbabies. I don't get on as often as I should but I think of you all often. Prayers to all. God Bless                                                  (((hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: How are you doing Boppy_of_5/Janice?

Posts.Content: Glad you are feeling better and that you and your Mom did ok. I hope the Taxotere is easier for you. I did not have any major probs with it. Happy too that you did not have to miss a treatment. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: ughh Chemo #5 and I'm sick!

Posts.Content: So very sorry for this loss Jo Jo. I know this is a difficult time for you and all the family. Prayers being said for all of you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: So very sorry for this loss Jo Jo. I know this is a difficult time for you and all the family. Prayers being said for all of you. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Im devastated....need prayers!!!!

Posts.Content: I had a dexa scan done after chemo because osteoporosis is thick on my Mom's side of the family. I know my mother has the bone density scans done yearly for the osteoporosis so I am not real sure what the difference is. I was just no help huh! God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Bone Scan vs Bone Density test

Posts.Content: It will be one year in March since my lumpectomy. I also had chemo and rads. I have been very tender esp. since rads. I asked my Onc. and he said it was normal. The nerves are still healing and regenerating. My breast still feels a little swollen too. My incision was on the outer part of my breast but it is still tender. Hope this helps. God Bless (((Hugs))) Janice
Posts.Title: Breast still tender 1yr later after lumpectomy
